    Getting_started Use annual indices and uncertainty to estimate trends over time

Function reference

All functions

annual_indicies_data
Pacific Wren annual indices from 1968 to 2022
fit_gam()
Fit gam models on posterior draws
fit_hgam()
Fit hierarchical GAM using annual indices and confidence interval
fit_smooths()
Extract Smooths from BBS model run
get_trend()
Generate trend based based on multiple draws of annual indices
plot_trend()
Plot predicted trends
predict_trend()
Predict generated trends into the future
prep_hgam()
Prepare GAM components for running stan model
